node_kinds.name: GH_Organization
node_kinds.description: A GitHub Organizationâ€”top-level container for repositories, teams, and settings

node_kinds.name: GH_Team
node_kinds.description: A team within an organization, grouping users for shared access and collaboration

node_kinds.name: GH_Repository
node_kinds.description: A code repository in an organization, containing files, issues, and other resources

node_kinds.name: GH_Branch
node_kinds.description: A named reference in a repository representing a line of development

node_kinds.name: GH_BranchProtectionRule
node_kinds.description: A branch protection rule that applies to one or more branches via pattern matching

node_kinds.name: GH_OrgRole
node_kinds.description: The role a user has at the organization level (e.g., admin, member)

node_kinds.name: GH_TeamRole
node_kinds.description: The role a user has within a team (e.g., maintainer, member)

node_kinds.name: GH_RepoRole
node_kinds.description: The permission granted to a user or team on a repository (e.g., admin, write, read)

node_kinds.name: GH_Workflow
node_kinds.description: A GitHub Actions workflow defined in a repository

node_kinds.name: GH_Environment
node_kinds.description: A GitHub Actions deployment environment with protection rules and deployment branch policies

node_kinds.name: GH_OrgSecret
node_kinds.description: An organization-level GitHub Actions secret that can be scoped to all, private, or selected repositories

node_kinds.name: GH_RepoSecret
node_kinds.description: A repository-level GitHub Actions secret accessible only to workflows in that repository

node_kinds.name: GH_EnvironmentSecret
node_kinds.description: An environment-level GitHub Actions secret scoped to a specific deployment environment

node_kinds.name: GH_SecretScanningAlert
node_kinds.description: A GitHub Advanced Security alert indicating a secret was accidentally committed to a repository

node_kinds.name: GH_SamlIdentityProvider
node_kinds.description: A SAML identity provider configured for the organization, enabling SSO

node_kinds.name: GH_ExternalIdentity
node_kinds.description: An external identity from a SAML/SCIM provider linked to a GitHub user for SSO authentication

node_kinds.name: GH_AppInstallation
node_kinds.description: A GitHub App installed on the organization with specific permissions and repository access

relationship_kinds.name: GH_Contains
relationship_kinds.description: Container relationship for organizational hierarchy (org contains users, teams, roles, secrets, etc.)

relationship_kinds.name: GH_Owns
relationship_kinds.description: Organization owns a repository

relationship_kinds.name: GH_HasRole
relationship_kinds.description: User or team has a role assignment (org role, team role, or repo role)

relationship_kinds.name: GH_MemberOf
relationship_kinds.description: Team role is a member of a team, or team is a nested member of a parent team

relationship_kinds.name: GH_AddMember
relationship_kinds.description: Team role can add members to the team (maintainer privilege)

relationship_kinds.name: GH_HasBaseRole
relationship_kinds.description: Role inherits permissions from another role

relationship_kinds.name: GH_CanPull
relationship_kinds.description: Repo role can clone/pull the repository

relationship_kinds.name: GH_ReadRepoContents
relationship_kinds.description: Repo role can read repository contents

relationship_kinds.name: GH_CanPush
relationship_kinds.description: Repo role can push to the repository

relationship_kinds.name: GH_WriteRepoContents
relationship_kinds.description: Repo role can write repository contents

relationship_kinds.name: GH_AdminTo
relationship_kinds.description: Repo role has admin access to the repository

relationship_kinds.name: GH_BypassProtections
relationship_kinds.description: Repo role can bypass branch protections

relationship_kinds.name: GH_EditProtections
relationship_kinds.description: Repo role can edit branch protection rules

relationship_kinds.name: GH_ViewSecretScanningAlerts
relationship_kinds.description: Repo role can view secret scanning alerts

relationship_kinds.name: GH_CreateRepository
relationship_kinds.description: Org role can create repositories in the organization

relationship_kinds.name: GH_InviteMember
relationship_kinds.description: Org role can invite members to the organization

relationship_kinds.name: GH_AddCollaborator
relationship_kinds.description: Org role can add outside collaborators

relationship_kinds.name: GH_CreateTeam
relationship_kinds.description: Org role can create teams in the organization

relationship_kinds.name: GH_TransferRepository
relationship_kinds.description: Org role can transfer repositories

relationship_kinds.name: GH_ManageOrganizationWebhooks
relationship_kinds.description: Org role can manage organization webhooks

relationship_kinds.name: GH_OrgBypassCodeScanningDismissalRequests
relationship_kinds.description: Org role can bypass code scanning dismissal requests

relationship_kinds.name: GH_OrgBypassSecretScanningClosureRequests
relationship_kinds.description: Org role can bypass secret scanning closure requests

relationship_kinds.name: GH_BypassPullRequestAllowances
relationship_kinds.description: User or team can bypass pull request requirements on a branch protection rule

relationship_kinds.name: GH_RestrictionsCanPush
relationship_kinds.description: User or team is allowed to push to branches protected by this rule

relationship_kinds.name: GH_HasBranch
relationship_kinds.description: Repository has this branch

relationship_kinds.name: GH_CanEditProtection
relationship_kinds.description: Repo role can modify or remove the branch protection rules governing this branch (computed from GH_EditRepoProtections + GH_ProtectedBy)

relationship_kinds.name: GH_ProtectedBy
relationship_kinds.description: Branch protection rule protects this branch

relationship_kinds.name: GH_HasWorkflow
relationship_kinds.description: Repository has this workflow

relationship_kinds.name: GH_HasEnvironment
relationship_kinds.description: Repository or branch has/can deploy to this environment

relationship_kinds.name: GH_HasSecret
relationship_kinds.description: Repository or environment has access to this secret

relationship_kinds.name: GH_HasSecretScanningAlert
relationship_kinds.description: Repository has this secret scanning alert

relationship_kinds.name: GH_HasSamlIdentityProvider
relationship_kinds.description: Organization has this SAML identity provider configured

relationship_kinds.name: GH_HasExternalIdentity
relationship_kinds.description: SAML identity provider has this external identity

relationship_kinds.name: GH_MapsToUser
relationship_kinds.description: External identity maps to a GitHub user or identity provider user

relationship_kinds.name: SyncedToGHUser
relationship_kinds.description: Identity provider user (Azure AD, Okta, PingOne) is synced to a GitHub user via SAML/SCIM

relationship_kinds.name: GH_CanAssumeAWSRole
relationship_kinds.description: GitHub repository, branch, or environment can assume an AWS IAM role via OIDC federation

relationship_kinds.name: CanAssumeIdentity
relationship_kinds.description: GitHub repository, branch, or environment can assume an Azure federated identity via OIDC
